sentences: Arvatakse, et elu avastamine sel planeedil on üsna väikese tõenäosusega.
Tõenäosus, et minu lotopilet võidab, on 0,07.
context: The word 'planeedil' is an Estonian adessive case form of the word 'planeet', which means 'planet'. The adessive case typically indicates location or position ('on', 'at'). In the given context from the dictionary definition, it appears in the sentence 'Arvatakse, et elu avastamine sel planeedil on üsna väikese tõenäosusega' which translates to 'It is estimated that the discovery of life on this planet has quite a small probability.' The word shows possession or association with something (in this case, a specific planet).
